class.name: G4MFTexture4D
class.description: G4MFTexture4D is a class for textures in the G4MF format. It is used to define the texture of a [G4MFMaterialChannel4D], which affects the appearance of the [G4MFMaterial4D] and therefore any [G4MFMeshSurface4D] that uses the material. [b]Note:[/b] This class is a placeholder, and currently does not do anything.

method.name: from_dictionary
method.description: Converts the given [Dictionary] representing the JSON of a G4MF texture to a [G4MFTexture4D]. This will set the fields of the [G4MFTexture4D] and [G4MFItem4D] classes based on the data in the [Dictionary].

method.name: to_dictionary
method.description: Converts the G4MF texture to a [Dictionary]. This is used for serializing the G4MF texture as JSON.
